00032 #include "egs_conez.h"
00033 #include "egs_input.h"
00034 
00035 string XProjector::type = "EGS_Xconez";
00036 string YProjector::type = "EGS_Yconez";
00037 string ZProjector::type = "EGS_Zconez";
00038 string Projector::type = "EGS_conez";
00039 
00040 extern "C" {
00041 
00042 EGS_CONEZ_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00043 
00044     // valid input
00045     if( !input ) {
00046         egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): null input?\n");
00047         return 0;
00048     }
00049     string type; int err = input ->getInput("type",type);
00050     if(err)
00051     { egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): missing type key\n");
00052       return 0;
00053     }
00054 
00055     // apex
00056     EGS_Vector xo; vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00057     err = input->getInput("apex",tmp);
00058     if( !err && tmp.size() == 3 ) xo=EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00059     else
00060     { egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): invalid apex\n");
00061       return 0;
00062     }
00063 
00064     // opening angles
00065         vector<EGS_Float> angles;
00066         err = input->getInput("opening angles",angles);
00067         bool is_radian = false;
00068         if( err ) {
00069             angles.clear();
00070             err = input->getInput("opening angles in radian",angles);
00071             if( err ) {
00072                 egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): no 'opening angles' or "
00073                  "'opening angles in radian' input\n"); return 0;
00074             }
00075             is_radian = true;
00076         }
00077 
00078         // check valid angles
00079         int nc = angles.size();
00080         for(int j=0; j<nc; j++) {
00081             if( angles[j] <= 0 ) {
00082                 egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): opening angles must be"
00083                        " positive\n"); return 0;
00084             }
00085             if( angles[j] >= 90 ) {
00086                 egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): opening angles should be "
00087                            "less than 90\n"); return 0;
00088             }
00089             if( j > 0 ) {
00090                 if( angles[j] <= angles[j-1] ) {
00091                     egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): opening angles must be"
00092                        " in increasing order\n"); return 0;
00093                 }
00094             }
00095         }
00096         EGS_Float *t=new EGS_Float [angles.size()];
00097         for(int i=0;i<nc;i++) t[i]=angles[i]*M_PI/180;
00098 
00099     // select geometry
00100     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00101          if( type == "EGS_Xconez" )
00102         g = new EGS_ConezX(nc,t,xo,"",XProjector());
00103     else if( type == "EGS_Yconez" )
00104         g = new EGS_ConezY(nc,t,xo,"",YProjector());
00105     else if( type == "EGS_Yconez" )
00106         g = new EGS_ConezZ(nc,t,xo,"",ZProjector());
00107     else
00108     { vector<EGS_Float> a;
00109       err=input->getInput("axis",a);
00110       if( err || a.size() !=3 )
00111       { egsWarning("createGeometry(conez): missing/wrong input\n");
00112         return 0;
00113       }
00114       egsWarning("got axis (%g,%g,%g)\n",a[0],a[1],a[2]);
00115 
00116         g = new EGS_Conez(nc,t,xo,"",
00117                           Projector(EGS_Vector(a[0],a[1],a[2])));
00118     }
00119 
00120     g->setName(input); g->setMedia(input);
00121     return g;
00122 }
00123 }
